comment: She is very passionate and it shows. Flexible and really wants to help you grow as a teacher. I had to redo a huge assignment and she worked with me to fix it and kept my grade up because she saw my effort. Her class equips you with resources, books, and authors to bring into your future class. I will truly miss her, I definitely recommend her.
She is so darn sweet and so passionate. I was a little intimidated at first, but I absolutely enjoyed her class and her as a professor.
TONS of reading. Quizzes every single class- you cannot wing these quizzes, readings must be done. Other than that, class is easy.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Lecture heavy

comment: Dr. Gardner is incredible. I genuinely loved her class and her assignments have distinct purpose. Do the work, come to class, participate, and youll be fine. One of my favorite professors I have ever taken!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Inspirational

comment: Dr. Gardner was a great professor to have. She is clear on what she expects of her students, and was always willing to work with you individually to clear up any confusion. Her assignments were time consuming but not difficult at all. Just do the work and ask questions and you will pass her class. She cares a lot for her students and it shows.

She is unclear on assignments of what she wants. We had three lesson plans throughout the semester and instead of pacing each lesson, she made us do silly work to "prep" for the lesson plans and made them all due at once. She is kind of rude and doesn't care that you are in overdrive taking this class with three others AND student teaching.

rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Tough grader
